p: Remdesivir is an antiviral agent that binds to the active site on RdRp has broad-spectrum activities against viruses including EBOLAV, MERS-CoV, and SARS-CoV with controversial results and in the absence of reported cardiovascular toxicity. It was the first drug used in SARS-CoV2. Clinical trials have shown no cytotoxicity or adverse reactions related [ [51], [52], [53], [54]].
